perspective. Most are focused on time series using the R platform. Nevertheless, even though
the code is not directly usable, the concepts, methods and descriptions are still valuable. This
section lists some useful books on applied time series that you may consider.
 Rob J. Hyndman and George Athanasopoulos, Forecasting: principles and practice, 2013.
http://amzn.to/2lln93c
 Galit Shmueli and Kenneth Lichtendahl, Practical Time Series Forecasting with R: A
Hands-On Guide, 2016.
